title: star guardian border not given?
body: so i have a question, for those who are gifted the star guardian skin do they not get the border around their load screen splash art?

replies.body: No you have to buy the First Star Edition for each one or the huge bundle.
What does First Star Edition mean? I tried Googling it and found nothing.
It is a bundle that gives you an icon, the skin, and the border for the skin. That is all there is to it.
does it work for 1 champ, or does it have to be all the star guardians? cuz i only play ahri lol
Yes, just make sure you are buying her on the bundle tab in the bundle with just her and the icon.
lol yeah i purchased everything star guardian ahri related XD
